title: Flash of Honesty: While discussing the difficulty of the ultra-poor to access fo...
body:
May 16, 2013 (Rep. Jay Swearingen on Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/Rep.Swearingen Delivered by 
Newstex)

 Flash of Honesty: While discussing the difficulty of the ultra-poor to access food @CaseyGuernsey's quote: "I 
have no sympathy." #moleg
